verses.name: Genesis 43:32
verses.text: And they set on for him by himself, and for them by themselves, and for the Egyptians, which did eat with him, by themselves: because the Egyptians might not eat bread with the Hebrews; for that is an abomination unto the Egyptians.

verses.name: Genesis 43:33
verses.text: And they sat before him, the firstborn according to his birthright, and the youngest according to his youth: and the men marvelled one at another.

verses.name: Genesis 43:34
verses.text: And he took and sent messes unto them from before him: but Benjamin’s mess was five times so much as any of theirs. And they drank, and were merry with him.
